verbose_text: Beyond the metabolic effects, trimetazidine has been shown to inhibit cardiac fibrosis, lower nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide phosphate-oxidase levels, and reduce reactive oxygen species production [XREF_BIBR], as well as protecting against IR injury by increasing endogenous antioxidants and regulating oxidative stress in the whole body [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
